languages.text: "Слава династии фон Валанциус! Слава вам, {name} — геро{mf|й|иня} Райкада Минорис!" {n}Статная красавица в нарядной одежде звонким голосом выкликает ваше имя. Только присмотревшись к лицу, можно понять, что это — капитан Ракель, пилот, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_RakelHelped}встреченная вами{/d} на Райкади Филии.{/n}

"Glory to the von Valancius dynasty! Glory to {name}, a {mf|hero|heroine} of Rykad Minoris!" {n}A stately, beautiful, and finely dressed woman calls out your name in a sonorous voice. It isn't until you take a closer look at her face that you recognise her as Captain Raquel, the pilot you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_RakelHelped}met{/d} on Rykadi Philia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Слава династии фон Валанциус! Слава вам, {name} — геро{mf|й|иня} Райкада Минорис!" {n}Статная красавица в нарядной одежде звонким голосом выкликает ваше имя. Только присмотревшись к лицу, можно понять, что это — капитан Ракель, пилот, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_RakelHelped}встреченная вами{/d} на Райкади Филии.{/n}

It isn't until you take a closer look at her face that you recognise her as Captain Raquel, the pilot you met on Rykadi Philia.{/n}

It isn't until you take a closer look at her face that you recognise her as Captain Raquel, the pilot you met on Rykadi Philia.{/n}

languages.text: "Hoch lebe die Dynastie von Valancius! Hoch lebe {name}, {mf|Held|Heldin} von Rykad Minoris!" {n}Eine elegante, wunderschöne und gut gekleidete Frau ruft mit sonorer Stimme deinen Namen. Erst, als du ihr Gesicht näher ansiehst, erkennst du sie als Captain Raquel, die Pilotin, der du auf Rykadi Philia {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_RakelHelped}begegnet{/d} bist.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glory to the von Valancius dynasty! Glory to {name}, a {mf|hero|heroine} of Rykad Minoris!" {n}A stately, beautiful, and finely dressed woman calls out your name in a sonorous voice. It isn't until you take a closer look at her face that you recognise her as Captain Raquel, the pilot you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_RakelHelped}met{/d} on Rykadi Philia.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hoch lebe die Dynastie von Valancius! Hoch lebe {name}, {mf|Held|Heldin} von Rykad Minoris!" {n}Eine elegante, wunderschöne und gut gekleidete Frau ruft mit sonorer Stimme deinen Namen. Erst, als du ihr Gesicht näher ansiehst, erkennst du sie als Captain Raquel, die Pilotin, der du auf Rykadi Philia begegnet bist.{/n}

languages.text: « Gloire à la dynastie von Valancius ! Gloire à {name}, {mf|héros|héroïne} de Rykad Minoris ! » {n}s'écrie une belle femme noble, parée avec finesse. Ce n'est qu'en observant plus attentivement son visage que vous reconnaissez la capitaine Raquel, la pilote que vous avez {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_RakelHelped}rencontrée{/d} sur Rykadi Philia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glory to the von Valancius dynasty! Glory to {name}, a {mf|hero|heroine} of Rykad Minoris!" {n}A stately, beautiful, and finely dressed woman calls out your name in a sonorous voice. It isn't until you take a closer look at her face that you recognise her as Captain Raquel, the pilot you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_RakelHelped}met{/d} on Rykadi Philia.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Gloire à la dynastie von Valancius ! Gloire à {name}, {mf|héros|héroïne} de Rykad Minoris ! » {n}s'écrie une belle femme noble, parée avec finesse. Ce n'est qu'en observant plus attentivement son visage que vous reconnaissez la capitaine Raquel, la pilote que vous avez rencontrée sur Rykadi Philia.{/n}

languages.text: “荣耀归于冯·瓦兰修斯王朝！荣耀归于{name}，小莱卡德的英雄！”{n}一位庄重、美丽、穿着考究的女人以洪亮的声音呼唤着你的名字。你仔细看着她的脸，认出她是菈克尔上尉，你在莱卡德菲利亚星上{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_RakelHelped}遇到{/d}的那位飞行员。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glory to the von Valancius dynasty! Glory to {name}, a {mf|hero|heroine} of Rykad Minoris!" {n}A stately, beautiful, and finely dressed woman calls out your name in a sonorous voice. It isn't until you take a closer look at her face that you recognise her as Captain Raquel, the pilot you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_RakelHelped}met{/d} on Rykadi Philia.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “荣耀归于冯·瓦兰修斯王朝！荣耀归于{name}，小莱卡德的英雄！”{n}一位庄重、美丽、穿着考究的女人以洪亮的声音呼唤着你的名字。你仔细看着她的脸，认出她是菈克尔机长，你在莱卡德菲利亚星上遇到的那位飞行员。{/n}

languages.text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に栄光あれ！ライカド・ミノリスの英雄{name}様に栄光あれ！」{n}品があって美しく、ピシッとした服装の女性が、ハキハキとした声でこちらの名前を呼ぶ。彼女の顔をじっくり見て初めて、それがライカディ・フィリアで{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_RakelHelped}会った{/d}操縦士、ラケル中隊長であると分かった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glory to the von Valancius dynasty! Glory to {name}, a {mf|hero|heroine} of Rykad Minoris!" {n}A stately, beautiful, and finely dressed woman calls out your name in a sonorous voice. It isn't until you take a closer look at her face that you recognise her as Captain Raquel, the pilot you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_RakelHelped}met{/d} on Rykadi Philia.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に栄光あれ！ライカド・ミノリスの英雄{name}様に栄光あれ！」{n}品があって美しく、ピシッとした服装の女性が、ハキハキとした声でこちらの名前を呼ぶ。彼女の顔をじっくり見て初めて、それがライカディ・フィリアで会った操縦士、ラケル中隊長であると分かった。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Gloria a la dinastía von Valancius! ¡Gloria a {name}, {mf|el|la} {mf|héroe|heroína} de Rykad Minoris!». {n}Una mujer señorial, hermosa y finamente vestida pronuncia tu nombre con voz sonora. No es hasta que la miras de cerca que la reconoces como la capitana Raquel, la piloto que {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_RakelHelped}conociste{/d} en Rykadi Philia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glory to the von Valancius dynasty! Glory to {name}, a {mf|hero|heroine} of Rykad Minoris!" {n}A stately, beautiful, and finely dressed woman calls out your name in a sonorous voice. It isn't until you take a closer look at her face that you recognise her as Captain Raquel, the pilot you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_RakelHelped}met{/d} on Rykadi Philia.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Gloria a la dinastía von Valancius! ¡Gloria a {name}, {mf|el|la} {mf|héroe|heroína} de Rykad Minoris!». {n}Una mujer señorial, hermosa y finamente vestida pronuncia tu nombre con voz sonora. No es hasta que la miras de cerca que la reconoces como la capitana Raquel, la piloto que conociste en Rykadi Philia.{/n}

languages.text: "Von Valancius hanedanlığı çok yaşa! Rykad Minoris'in kahramanı {name} çok yaşa!" {n}Alımlı ve şık giyimli bir kadın, gür sesiyle sana sesleniyor. Yüzünü biraz daha inceleyince Rykadi Philia'da {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_RakelHelped}tanıştığın{/d} pilot Kaptan Raquel olduğunu anlıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glory to the von Valancius dynasty! Glory to {name}, a {mf|hero|heroine} of Rykad Minoris!" {n}A stately, beautiful, and finely dressed woman calls out your name in a sonorous voice. It isn't until you take a closer look at her face that you recognise her as Captain Raquel, the pilot you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_RakelHelped}met{/d} on Rykadi Philia.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Von Valancius hanedanlığı çok yaşa! Rykad Minoris'in kahramanı {name} çok yaşa!" {n}Alımlı ve şık giyimli bir kadın, gür sesiyle sana sesleniyor. Yüzünü biraz daha inceleyince Rykadi Philia'da tanıştığın pilot Kaptan Raquel olduğunu anlıyorsun.{/n}
